title: Onyeeze
author: Onyeeze
content: Theirs so many investment to invest but many people are seeing bitcoin as the highest place to invest their money but I'm not seeing bitcoin as highest investing plan ever, I don't know people have not invested in bitcoin is thinking of bitcoin as investment you can make millions dollars when you started, I'm preaching to change our people mindset of bitcoin investment so that they will not hope that bitcoin investment make somebody to be rich the way they think of it.Some people have not known that so many people who are investing in bitcoin doesn't fully depend on bitcoin as most generating income, they are using bitcoin as their side hustle, let us reduce the mentality of people and sense of humour by not seen bitcoin as the shortest way to make money, And if they should continue with such believe they may commit suicide when they put all their money and problems in bitcoin and lose by the end of the investment.We have other investment that we can make money with, importation and exportation and also real estate management and also gas plant business that will be given weekly and monthly income depends how broad is the business and management, sometimes people do teach their children bitcoin and its not bad but let us teach our children other investment that can profit them as we think that bitcoin will profit then in future. Whoever that is having bitcoin as major source of income should spread it source of income and make bitcoin a side hustle.It's good to invest in bitcoin but let us remember that it's a virtual and any money and profit we make in bitcoin should be directed to establish another business that will be seen physically and be managed physically.

comments.author: Ndabagi01
comments.body: Quote from: Onyeeze on August 09, 2023, 07:11:23 PMTheirs so many investment to invest but many people are seeing bitcoin as the highest place to invest their money but I'm not seeing bitcoin as highest investing plan ever, I don't know people have not invested in bitcoin is thinking of bitcoin as investment you can make millions dollars when you started, I'm preaching to change our people mindset of bitcoin investment so that they will not hope that bitcoin investment make somebody to be rich the way they think of it.What you think is not what others think, and if you think or feel you can't make it big in bitcoin or rely on it as your sole source of income, people do and it works out for them. You'd be astonished to learn that the majority of people who invest massively in bitcoin are risk takers with a prepared mindset. Bitcoin is the only cryptocurrency with a guaranteed rate of return. To me, they are not gambling with their money, but rather taking a risk that will benefit them significantly in the future.QuoteSome people have not known that so many people who are investing in bitcoin doesn't fully depend on bitcoin as most generating income, they are using bitcoin as their side hustle, let us reduce the mentality of people and sense of humour by not seen bitcoin as the shortest way to make money, And if they should continue with such believe they may commit suicide when they put all their money and problems in bitcoin and lose by the end of the investment.That is why the phrase "invest only what you can afford to lose" is commonly used. The market is volatile, and nothing will ever go as planned if you want to make a long-term lucrative investment. A prepared mindset will not have any issues with this and will be prepared to confront whatever market consequences result from investment. If you are concerned about your ability to resist market volatility, you can simply buy and hold instead of trading. Return on investment is guaranteed regardless of how long it takes, so there's no need to fear because you already invested what you could afford at the time without having to touch it for personal expenses.

comments.body: Importation and exportation also has risk so does every other investment, there is no one that is void of risk and there are Factors that affects all investment plans like Capital and timing just mentioning a few this factors are strong enough to determine who makes it from a particular investment opportunities and who doesn't.Those who invested in Bitcoin and held prior to a bull run can testify they made good investment out of it and that's what timing can do.I think you should rather teach people not to only see Bitcoin as a point of investment but also as a financial services solution to the traditional ways.

comments.author: panganib999
comments.body: With the current situation of bitcoin (30k, had a huge possibility to pump in value in the next couple of months thanks to the halving and good news coming from left and right) it's actually a smart thing to invest in bitcoin as early as possible. And even if these things aren't here you could easily make money in bitcoin through holding, as what most people did in 2017 onwards. As of now it's no longer a measly speculative asset since there's a massive and consistent uptrend in value since 2009, and if you're going to trust that graph you best believe that soon enough as long as you play your cards right you'd be able to rake in money as well. So investing in bitcoin is a no-brainer especially if you're looking to invest for long anyway.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Investing in Bitcoin can be a strong choice if managed well and if you have sufficient funds after covering your family's financial needs. However, it's important to note that Bitcoin is an investment with no guaranteed returns. It's possible that you might need to wait a considerable amount of time to see a recovery in its value due to its high volatility. Therefore, determining whether Bitcoin is the right investment depends on various factors.

comments.author: 21mBrian
comments.body: IMO, all the investment options have their effective terms, and these may also depend on your location. For example, in my country, the share market averages around 10 years+ and real estate is 20 years+. According to current experience (though this might be different in the future), Bitcoin can be a 4-year investment with a high enough return that works globally. This is much better than most options, but yes, it is not the highest-return strategy. Well, usually, a higher return means higher risk. If you are expecting a very short-term and super high return, that is speculation. So, in short, if you want to save your money and not move it for an average of 4 years, Bitcoin is a sound investment.

comments.author: MinoRaiola
comments.body: I would say BTC is one of the most interesting, but it is not an investment alone. It is also freedom, no one else has access to the Bitcoin except you. For many people, it is not easy to buy Bitcoin, or it is forbidden. Everything that is forbidden makes it more interesting. An investment is also possible with a target, be it with a fixed interest rate. Or a real estate project, but the risk is higher, also the profit. But these are funds managed by banks.

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: The narrative about bitcoin being promoted to the mainstream about it being a get rich scheme is done by influencers. Most influencers talk about Bitcoin as an investment opportunity and a lot of people that investing in Bitcoin in the past especially in bull runs bought in as s result of this. Majority of these people know very little to nothing about Bitcoin or it's purpose - ignoring the upside benefits of the network. The way to correct this is that moving forward, we talk about the all benefits including the financial/technological/economical benefits that come with Bitcoin as opposed to shilling it everyday as a get rich scheme which ends up creating bad impressions about bitcoin when things go south (eg: price going down in a bear market for someone that bought in during the peak of a bull run.)

Bitcoin is a multi purpose asset that can be used on different needs. Having a non custodial wallet makes the bitcoin within the wallet be like money in our bank. It serves as a transaction source, currency and on different other needs. However majority prioritise bitcoin for the growth it provides over the investment. The market fluctuation used to be high against other forms of investment. This makes it riskier, but the person who is able to hold with patience profits for sure.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: To the best of my knowledge, Satoshi invented the bitcoin to serve as digital currency in place of fiat which is working perfectly well up till this point in time but the truth is that it was turned into an investment option as the value began to appreciate years back. People started seeing the worth and was quick to trade with it to see how it goes and it happened that they traded some good fortune from it and they saw the need for holding which in the sense means they have seen the potentials of bitcoin growing in value in years to come which made them took advantage of it and from there bitcoin was seen as an investment option and I also see the reasons for it too because as time goes on, there is always a room for improvement and I believe the idea of bitcoin investment was the improvement to serve human better.OP bitcoin being an investment option still looks like other investment out there which one engages to make profit. As we all know, there is always ups and downs with investments and bitcoin is not exempted. In as much as it is a volatile asset, one needs to understand that volatility is the nature of such assets and nobody can predict the next swing as it is adversely affected by many factor which it is dependent on and vice versa. One thing I think you should know about investment is that there is no business or investment that is risk free. All investment have their trying times and good times as well but your ability to take advantage of every market situations puts you on the right track.
